text: An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the keyboard on the MSI GP Series GP65 Leopard 9SF-240 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the MSI GP Series GP65 Leopard 9SF-240 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GP Series GP65 Leopard 9SF-240 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GP Series GP65 Leopard 9SF-240 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GP Series GP65 Leopard 9SF-240 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
